thread.title: Scholarship, healthcare, gadgets... gifts pour in for viral woman Mum Zee
thread.title_full: Scholarship, healthcare, gadgets... gifts pour in for viral woman Mum Zee

author: Taiwo Oshunloye
title: Scholarship, healthcare, gadgets... gifts pour in for viral woman Mum Zee
text: Gifts have kept pouring in for Deborah Loveth (Mum Zee), the lady who became a sensation on X for waking up very early to cook for her husband. Mum Zee [went viral](https://lifestyle.thecable.ng/x-users-gift-over-n2m-to-lady-criticised-for-cooking-for-husband-at-450-am/) after she disclosed the reason she gets up from bed at 4:50 am to prepare her husband’s lunch. The lady said she made it a daily routine after her husband told her his colleague (a female) brought two spoons with her food to work so they could eat together. The tweet sparked arguments on social media. While some users criticised her over the routine others tackled her husband for eating out in the first instance. Amid the criticism, some users on X rallied support and donations for Mum Zee. Mum Zee later [revealed](https://lifestyle.thecable.ng/x-users-gift-over-n2m-to-lady-criticised-for-cooking-for-husband-at-450-am/) that the donations had passed over N2 million. Loveth has also received several gifts courtesy of celebrities, brands, and X users. Some of the gifts include a movie date at Filmhouse cinemas, a year’s supply of insecticide, free antenatal and delivery care, scholarships to study abroad, health insurance, and legal representation for one year. The expecting mother also received maternity gowns, toiletries, provisions, data and Netflix subscriptions, electricity bills, cryptocurrency, airtime, a year’s supply of diapers, and family care insurance in Oyo state. Other gifts range from phones, bed frames, home appliances, laptops, food items, window blinds, TV stands, mattresses, rugs, artworks, jerseys and clothing items for herself and her husband. Nigerian couple breaks the internet with viral love story on X. A Nigerian woman, Mummy Zee and her husband, Mr. Adebisi have been gifted scholarships, furnitures, a freezer, window blind, website, AC, free web designing classes, data analysis classes and over N3 million after… [pic.twitter.com/UfTYrcujEB]Advertisement — Africa Facts Zone (@AfricaFactsZone) [January 6, 2024] Mum Zee also took to X to thank some of the persons, brands, and firms that have sent her gifts. We fix am till December 💃🏽💃🏽💃🏽 [https://t.co/1qKCPfE6dI]Advertisement — MumZee✨🇳🇬 (@_Debbie_OA) [January 7, 2024] HOW AM I JUST SEEING THIS!!!! Thank you Sucre mamito🥺🥺🥺🙏🏽🙏🏽 [https://t.co/bbP1P2ohmQ] — MumZee✨🇳🇬 (@_Debbie_OA) [January 7, 2024] SIR DICKS N [@Wizarab10]this tv is big o, ahhhh, we'll have to move out. There's no space here. Thank you [@nnpclimited]😭🥺🙏🏽🙏🏽🙏🏽 Can anyone around me use the voucher too?😌 [https://t.co/0INvqMcYaf] — MumZee✨🇳🇬 (@_Debbie_OA) [January 7, 2024] Kuda Microfinance Bank offered to double her account balance which totals over N2 million because she is their customer. As your bank, we’re happy to match the ₦2,044,133.94 balance in your screenshot. Keep doing you, Debbie! 💜 [https://t.co/Ls0kDEAeVM] — Kuda App (@joinkuda) [January 6, 2024] She also disclosed that someone recommended her for a remote job where she would earn N50,000 monthly while her husband was offered a scholarship to learn data science.
